data.title: Ziziphus mauritiana
data.text: Foliage Its alternate leaves are ovate or oblong-elliptic (2.5-6.3 cm long, 2-4 cm wide). Upperside of the leaf (adaxial surface) is dark-green and smooth, while underside (abaxial surface) is hairy and silver. Fruit Fruits are round, obovate, oval or oblong (6.3 cm long, 4.5 cm wide). Light green to yellow immature fruits turn brownish orange, reddish brown or red at maturity.
